data: The story of the Sleeping Beauty is well known; we have excellent accounts of it, both in prose and in verse.

The Story of the Duchess of Cicogne and of Monsieur de Boulingrin
1920
France, Anatole, 1844-1924; May, J. Lewis (James Lewis), 1873-1961 [Editor]; Miall, Bernard, 1876-1953 [Editor]; Stewart, D. B. [Translator]
